description:
Game available only in Brazilian Portuguese

This game was a college project, made in 2015, with sort duration.

Soon will be a new 901, with more content, new story and SCARIER História

Você é um monitor do período noturno de uma Faculdade, que cochilou no fim de expediente de sexta-feira, mas quando acordou, percebeu que está sozinho no 9º andar do prédio, com todas as luzes desligadas e portas trancadas. Precisa encontrar um meio de ir para casa.

Jogando

Necessário teclado e recomendado usar mouse.

  • WASD - movimentação do jogador
  • Mouse - movimento da câmera
  • Botão direito do mouse - zoom da câmera
  • F - liga/desliga lanterna
  • E - interação com ambiente
Story

You are a nighttime monitor at college, you felt asleep at the end of friday's office hour, but when woke up, found you alone in 9th floor, all the lights are off and the doors locked. You have to find a way to go home.

Playing

Use keybord and mouse

  • WASD - player moviments
  • Mouse - camera moviments
  • Right button - camera zoom
  • F - turn on/off flashlight
  • E - interact with the environment
Credits
  • Bruno Roberto Nascimento de Sousa: documentation, narrative, level design
  • Giovanni Fonseca Bartholomeu: art design
  • Melissa Iida Okanishi: modeling and texturing, art design, level design
  • Thiago Renan do Carmo Castro Rodrigues: art design, modeling
  • Victoria Machado de Oliveira (Vic Walker): programming, narrative, SFX, level design
  • Akuma Akira: main soundtrack

All scripts now available on GitHub.
